data.text: @HeatherMoAndCo Have you confirmed with the family directly? If not then you are potentially spreading false information which is incredibly hypocritical Heather.

@HeatherMoAndCo @MeemawMcAllist1 Exactly. I was hearing from pro-convoy people that we didn't hear of any of the convoy being hospitalized/dying of COVID, but it's obviously because they wouldn't report it if they did
@ConvoN5Bucks @hiebzky @HeatherMoAndCo You watch too much FOX.  Go have some Javex
@HeatherMoAndCo He would've been free to live if he'd just gotten vaccinated. The irony kills me. But the virus won't. I'm vaxxed to the max.
@hiebzky Thank you. He died a few months before the vaccines became available. Covid pneumonia. It ripped through his system with lightning speed.
@HeatherMoAndCo So sorry to hear. Around here a lot of people hide anything related to COVID. Southern MB isn't exactly open to the facts.

@hiebzky Yeah, there aren’t too many reasons family are not allowed in the room with a dying patient. 

My older brother died of covid. We were told we wouldn’t be permitted to even step foot in the room with him.
